message: On April 17, in Washington D.C. in the rotunda of the Capitol building, the United States Congress awarded a Congressional Gold Medal to Dr. Muhammad Yunus in recognition of his contributions to the fight against global poverty. The Act states: “Dr. Muhammad Yunus has demonstrated the life-changing potential of extending very small loans (at competitive interest rates) to the very poor and the economic feasibility of microcredit and other microfinance and microenterprise practices and services.
